column5: Please increase the size of our PM boxes?? is it possible?? 3 pages of Pms and my Messenger is full.. I add the important one to my saved folder but they count against your total box size.. Anyway to remedy this? I have to delete them often.. and then realize CRAP I needed that one!!  Please advise, I would be forever grateful   G.
Why don't you archive your messages and have them emailed to yourself?
Nah...he just pisses a lot of people off and can't keep track of who he has blocked..and who he hasn't !
Truer words have never been spoken!!  G.
Thought you'd see the humour truth in that ! LOL
can you not cut and paste and save them somewhere else?
Eeeeeee doggie, granny says! LOL!  Ahem... sorry hair in my throat.  LOL!  Gerritt.
